name: CPU/RAM Test
description:
Simple processing power test.

Controls:

Press [1] to add 10 dots

Press [2] to add 100 dots

Press [3] to add 1000 dots

Press [4] to add 10000 dots

How it works: 

Greater numbers of dots present will require greater computations from your device, decreasing its FPS (frames per second) displayed at the top. The number of dots at which your FPS drops below certain values allows you to gauge your device's performance. This program tests the CPU and RAM performances of your device simultaneously.
